name: Imagine - Figure Skater [NDS]
description:
Train and take part in tournaments with the ultimate goal of joining the figure skating world. The journey is not just about training; there will be friendship and romance along the way! Do what it takes to make yourself sparkle on the ice! Customize new outfits for each routine. Prepare to perform jumps, spins, triple axles, lutz, and salchows.

Features

• Train and become a gold medalist Figure Skater!
• Live the life to see what it means to become a champion.
• Customize new outfits for each routine.
• Prepare to perform jumps, spins, triple axles, lutz, and salchows.
